## OrgsAPI.postOrgsIDLabels() method

Add a label to an organization. See [https://v2.docs.influxdata.com/v2.0/api/\#operation/PostOrgsIDLabels](https://v2.docs.influxdata.com/v2.0/api/#operation/PostOrgsIDLabels)

